meeting_info.organization: City Center TIF District Board of Directors
meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6DN Conference Room and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Call meeting to order and declare a quorum is established.
Public comments pertaining to agenda items 4 and 5.
Review and consider the Meeting Record of the January 11, 2024 joint meeting.
agenda_items.description: Review and consider the Meeting Record of the January 11, 2024 joint meeting of the City Center TIF District Board of Directors, the Downtown Connection TIF District Board of Directors, and the Downtown Dallas Development Authority Board of Directors.
agenda_items.presenter: Dorcy Clark, Senior Manager, Office of Economic Development

agenda_items.title: Review and consider a development agreement with West End Lofts LP.
agenda_items.description: Review and consider a development agreement with West End Lofts LP and/or its affiliates in an amount not to exceed $49,000,000 comprised of various economic development grants and TIF Subsidy for the West End Lofts Project.
agenda_items.presenter: Dorcy Clark, Senior Manager, Office of Economic Development
agenda_items.action_required: Approve TIF Subsidy and forward a recommendation of approval of the TIF Subsidy to City Council

financial_items.description: City Subsidy for West End Lofts Project

Chapter 380 economic development grant sourced from 2012 and 2024 City General Obligation Bond Funds
